title: RECAP - EXAMPLE
summary: This is an example summary, and is the 2nd most recent post in the DB.
body: This is where there can be a description of the race. For example, driver A passed driver B on lap 29 to take the lead. The race was won by Driver C, scoring 25 points in the championship. For the fantasy league, team A moved up 2 places in the standings while team B fell to last after a DNF by their primary driver. title: RECAP - Chinese GP
summary: 2 Safety cars and 2 DNFs sees an exciting race weekend for the first Chinese Grand Prix since 2019.
body: This is where there can be a description of the race. For example, driver A passed driver B on lap 29 to take the lead. The race was won by Driver C, scoring 25 points in the championship. For the fantasy league, team A moved up 2 places in the standings while team B fell to last after a DNF by their primary driver.
